name: Joelbay Collections
languagesUsed: HTML, SASS, Typescript, Express, Mongoose, MongoDB, GIT
description: RPG of Legends is a basic web-based role-playing game that allows users to create characters, embark on quests, and level up. Users can create accounts, log in, create characters with unique attributes, and send their characters on quests to earn experience points.
projectDetails: Spearheaded the development of Joelbay Collections, showcasing expertise in crafting robust backend solutions for e-commerce platforms.
Leveraged a cutting-edge tech stack, mastering Node.js, Express, Sequelize, and JWT, while seamlessly integrating external services for enhanced functionality.
Demonstrated skills on a live site, highlighting proficiency in creating and optimizing API routes for seamless user experiences and efficient data management

name: RPG OF LEGENDS
languagesUsed: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Express, Mongoose, MongoDB, GIT
description: RPG of Legends is a basic web-based role-playing game that allows users to create characters, embark on quests, and level up. Users can create accounts, log in, create characters with unique attributes, and send their characters on quests to earn experience points.
projectDetails: Utilized cookies and JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for user authentication to ensure only authorized users can access the game features.
Deployed the application on a cloud platform. The frontend was hosted on Netlify, while the backend was deployed on Render for seamless interaction.
Utilized MongoDB to store user information and character data, ensuring data persistence and efficient retrieval.

name: Quiz Wizard
languagesUsed: HTML, CSS, TypeScript, React, Mongoose, MongoDB, Trello, Git
description: A Full stack MERN web application is a secure, authenticated platform that uses Typescript to create and take quizzes. The application is designed to provide a seamless user experience with a modern and sleek interface.
projectDetails: Developed a secure, authenticated Full stack MERN web application with Typescript for creating and taking quizzes
Utilized cookies for user authentication to ensure only authorized users can access and manage quizzes
Implemented CRUD operations on the server-side using Express.js to manage quiz data stored in a MongoDB database

name: My Job Tracker
languagesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Express, React, Mongoose, MongoDB, Scrum, Trello, Git
description: An Express-React App to be able to add, view, and be linked to job postings with details on each job.
projectDetails: Worked in a team and utilized Git for version control during the development and deployment of the project
Implemented CRUD operations, UI using React components, server-side logic using Express.js, and integrated MongoDB database
Enhanced user experience by implementing detailed view of each job posting and direct application link

name: Harry Potter Wiki
languagesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Express, EJS, Mongoose, MongoDB, Git
description: An Express-React App to be able to add, view, and be linked to job postings with details on each job.
projectDetails: Built fully functional and styled CRUD application, storing and accessing information on MongoDB with Mongoose
Implemented the Bootstrap Framework to supplement CSS, increasing responsiveness to mobile platform
Experienced the importance of abstraction when having to go back an refactor hardcoded areas and debugging
